scripts.clean:reports: (if exist cypress\reports (rmdir /Q /S cypress\reports)) && mkdir cypress\reports && mkdir cypress\reports\mocha  &&  mkdir cypress\reports\mochareports
scripts.posttest: npm run combine-reports && npm run generate-report
scripts.test: npm run scripts || npm run posttest
scripts.browser-firefox: && npm run firefox || npm run posttest
scripts.browser-Chrome: npm run clean:reports && npm run chrome && npm run posttest || npm run posttest
